The town has a large population of people of Nepalese ancestry and has a population of around 900. Gyalshing (Geyzing) is the administrative centre of West Sikkim.
There is a daily bus connection to Gangtok and to Siliguri (via Jorethang), both at 8am.
Shared jeeps go to Gangtok (4 to 5 hrs, INR 120), Siliguri (INR 125), Legship and Jorethang, whre you have to change car when you want to go ahead to Darjeeling.
There ar taxis to Pelling (30 mins, INR 20). Taxis to Pelling also operate in the afternoon, whereas taxis to other places leave in the morning only.

value: directions=near the market, on the road to Tashigang
